verbose_text: There were clear negative relationships between Cd or Pb concentrations in fish intestines and S. rubrimaris infrapopulation size, i.e. as the infrapopulation size of S. rubrimaris in the intestines of S. rivulatus increases, the concentrations of both Cd and Pb in the intestines significantly decrease.
evidence: fish intestines and S. rubrimaris infrapopulation size, i.e. as the infrapopulation size of S. rubrimaris in the intestines of S. rivulatus increases, the concentrations of both Cd and Pb in the intestines significantly decrease
